text: 1 b a a n b n b 1| b a n n * n - batch size + m-input size (number of features) + Delta - error « W - weight matrix « S sum matrix for wx, (over all instances of the minibatch) * Z - output matrix after the activation function f is applied to each element of sum matrix S + KEEP S and Z around for back prop! http://briandolhansky.com/blog/2014/10/30/artificial-neural-networks-matrix-form-part-5
